string-array.name: change_log
string-array.item: Added a way to view sdcards, should work with most devices/versions, but may not work on some
Fixed freezing when not choosing an external video player
Added more error messages for corrupted save files
Fixed rendering text for all Korean games
Fixed Moon of Darkness from crashing on startup (Chinese)
Fixed games crashing when \'#\' is used in the script
Fixed a lot of videos that didn\'t run before (Umineko, Tsuki ni yorisou otome no sahou 2, etc)
Added "ext_card" and "MicroSD" paths as external sdcard cards
Fix several Korean translated games (Hotch Kiss, Auyoki no Eustia, Princess Frontier)
Fixes some text glitches from Kagetsu Tohya
Fixes saving when not providing a save folder
Fixes menu decoding when using different script language
Changed preferences from xml to json
Fixes Tsukihime Russian Demo so it can play
Fixed videos (Akatsuki no Goei, Lovely Quest, Secret Game, etc)
Prevent loading corrupted save files that causes crashes
Fixed freezing when turning phone on
Fixed a bunch of Korean games (e.g Akatsuki no Goei, Cross channel, Nanatsu no Fushigi no Owaru Toki, etc)
Fixed the black screen on Tsukihime
Fixed loading issues with Kagetsu Toyha
Added higher quality option in settings
Hid statusbar for Android 4.0–4.1 when playing a game
Bypass Kitkat issue not able to save to external sdcard
Added fix to allow rooted users to write to sdcard
Fixes bug that did not allow users to pick a custom font
Fixed back button from the game
Fixes system text for each language
